Name: }bedrock.cube.dimension.add

Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pDimIndex
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: Dimension number of the new dimension in the cube

Parameters.Name: pIncludeData
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: If 1 then data is kept (copied through clone cube)

Parameters.Name: pEle
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: if IncludeData flag =1: Element of new dimension where to store data

Parameters.Name: pIncludeRules
Parameters.Prompt: Unload and reload the rule (0 = do not keep the rule 1 = unload the rule 2 = unload the rule and reload on new cube)

Parameters.Name: pTemp
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delete the clone cube (1 = delete 0 = not delete)
